Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Marco Polo Parkside Beijing in Beijing (North Chaoyang), you'll be convenient to North Star Shopping Mall and China National Convention Center. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Xin'ao Shopping Center and Olympic Forest Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 315 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite body treatments and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an indoor pool and a fitness center. This Art Deco hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Limited parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Pamper yourself with onsite body treatments and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an indoor pool and a fitness center. This Art Deco hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature rainfall showerheads and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Marco Polo Parkside Beijing in Beijing (North Chaoyang), you'll be convenient to North Star Shopping Mall and China National Convention Center. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Xin'ao Shopping Center and Olympic Forest Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

North Star Shopping Mall - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Xin'ao Shopping Center - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Olympic Forest Park - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
China National Convention Center - 1.7 km / 1 mi
National Stadium - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Beijing International Convention Center - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
National Indoor Stadium - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
National Aquatics Center - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Olympic Sports Center - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Ditan Park - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Lama Temple - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Tsinghua University - 6.4 km / 4 mi
The Imperial College - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Temple of Confucius - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Deshengmen - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi

The preferred airport for Marco Polo Parkside Beijing is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 17.9 km / 11.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: The hotel is within a quick 25 minutes’ drive to the Beijing International Airport and five minutes’ walk to nearby subway stations. In sight of the China National Convention Center and other major conference and exhibition centers, the hotel is also close to the Zhongguancun, Wangjing and Shangdi IT zones.
